retention_statement: Retain 5 years after end of calendar year, then microfilm records according to Library of Virginia's standards/guidelines; retain microfilm permanently in agency. Destroy originals after quality control inspection verifies information was successfully transferred to new format. Disposal reporting of paper on Certificate of Records (RM-3 Form) not required.
